sources.title: American Confederate | Full Western Civil War Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under non-exclusive license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.*** 

American Confederate - "American Confederate" follows a group of Confederate cavalry, and a group of Union (Federal) cavalry, from late 1862 until the end of the Civil War in 1865.

2019
Stars: William Adams, Jezibell Anat, Kimberly Campbell

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
